actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to terminate the authority for the pursuit of flight training programs by veterans and for the pursuit of correspondence training programs by veterans, wives and widows.

summary.text: Terminates the authority for the pursuit of flight training programs by veterans and for the pursuit of correspondence training programs by veterans, wives, and widows.

titles.title: A bill to terminate the authority for the pursuit of flight training programs by veterans and for the pursuit of correspondence training programs by veterans, wives and widows.
